name: AIMS-Grades-Script
description: A app to get notifications(email) for grade changes on IIITR AIMS portal

cookie.desc: The cookie you got from your browsers dev-tools

email.desc: Email to send grade email from

password.desc: Password for that email (Hint: Use Google App Passwords for Google Accounts)

period.desc: Email to send grade email from

receiver.desc: Email to send grade email from
